title: 弄RPG服比较好还是MOD服比较好
author: DeathSolo
txt_content: 又想弄RPG服，但觉得太麻烦，又想弄MOD服，但感觉太简单，都不知道怎么办

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: mod服挺好的

replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content: MOD和RPG都不行，我感觉都不好

replies.author: tqw2738234980
replies.txt_content: 我感觉mod服可以，毕竟可以娱乐

replies.author: 彬少哟
replies.txt_content: mod服可玩性还行

replies.author: 依喏嗨~
replies.txt_content: 个人觉得mod服会比rpg稍微轻松点

replies.author: MCxiaoliujun
replies.txt_content: 个人认为MOD吧  RPG太多要自己慢慢更新的了

replies.author: 如梦舞韵
replies.txt_content: 缺op嘛！我能提供一些想法quq

replies.author: 梦江南
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: RainIFunS
replies.txt_content: 为啥不一起，RPG的MOD服

replies.author: 半句の情话
replies.txt_content: mod服还行

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: RPG的话做好还行 而且插件服性能损耗一般没MOD服高

replies.author: 封徵
replies.txt_content: 其实mod服也不简单的 破事一堆

replies.author: 逍__遥
replies.txt_content: 如果你有编辑RPG的经验你可以去弄RPG,MOD服务器到中后期太吃电脑资源了

replies.author: 红烧猪排骨
replies.txt_content: RPG需要一些脑洞，MOD服的话可以找有些有趣的模组丰富自己服务器的内容

replies.author: 小丛雨
replies.txt_content: mod服可能比较耐玩？

replies.author: WhyMeSoDiao
replies.txt_content: 建议搞个神奇宝贝mod服务器 或者群峦 都挺猛的 RPG真的烦

replies.author: 智乃offical
replies.txt_content: RPG的前提是有MOD

replies.author: FunnyKing
replies.txt_content: 宣传到位的话做什么服应该都ok

replies.author: QAQQAQ123
replies.txt_content: 两个一起做就好了emmm
modrpg一起挺好的

replies.author: CrazyPeanut
replies.txt_content: 不要为自己懒找接口 2333

replies.author: 子桦
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: a1b2c3d4!?@
replies.txt_content: 模组服吃香 rpg服已经烂大街了

replies.author: 梦回三国a
replies.txt_content: 两个各有各的长处，我个人觉得mod服要简单点

replies.author: 橙味饮品
replies.txt_content: 个人建议RPG服，玩原版玩多了，MOD服不习惯

replies.author: Herdeny
replies.txt_content: 不妨换个思路，Mod+一点点RPG也是很吃香的

replies.author: 烟花灬笑
replies.txt_content: RPG+MOD他不香么

replies.author: Sportsboy
replies.txt_content: MOD加RPG  可是MOD的武器都会有些变态！~
RPG服难做，难度大，mod服简单，BUG多，看你选

replies.author: Doogan
replies.txt_content:
rpg 太麻烦 全是自己写
我就在搞rpg 可以过来康康
麻烦的一批

replies.author: Dy菠萝派
replies.txt_content: MOD服吧 宣发一定要弄好..

replies.author: dfsy
replies.txt_content: mod吧rpg比较麻烦

replies.author: 四处恰饭
replies.txt_content:
RPG mod服
手动滑稽
